This is a simple app to calculate tax. If you are working in Australia during **2015-2016** and you want to know how much tax you have to pay then this App is for you.


It is an Interactive app. As soon as you enter your salary in left side the tax amount will be displayed on right side.


The formula used to calculate Tax is taken from  <https://www.ato.gov.au/Rates/Individual-income-tax-rates/>

The app do not include the:

1. Medicare levy of 2%

2. Temporary Budget Repair Levy; this levy is payable at a rate of 2% for taxable incomes over $180,000.
